title: 74/296. Global service delivery model
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/74/296
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
16 July 2020 
 
20-09431 (E)    200720     
*2009431* 
 
 
Seventy-fourth session 
Agenda item 135 
Programme budget for 2020 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly on  
13 July 2020 
 
 
[on the report of the Fifth Committee (A/74/614/Add.1)] 
 
 74/296. Global service delivery model 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Recalling section III of its resolution 67/246 of 24 December 2012, paragraph 13 
of section VII of its resolution 69/262 of 29 December 2014, paragraph 19 of its 
resolution 69/273 of 2 April 2015, section XIX of its resolution 70/248 A of 
23 December 2015, section XVII of its resolution 71/272 A of 23 December 2016, 
section IV of its resolution 72/262 C of 5 July 2018 and its decision 73/547 B of 
15 April 2019,  
 
Having considered the report of the Secretary-General on the global service 
delivery model for the United Nations Secretariat1 as well as the related report of the 
Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions, 2  
 
Decides to keep the question of the global service delivery model under review 
and to revert on the status of the above-mentioned reports1,2 at the main part of its 
seventy-fifth session.3 
 
13 July 2020 
 
__________________ 
 
1  A/73/706. 
 
2  A/73/791. 
 
3  Postponement of the decision on whether the reports should continue to be considered, whether 
the General Assembly should request the Secretary-General to submit a new, updated or revised 
report or whether no action should be taken on the reports.
